start.text: Entering operational theatre. Hit them until they do not get up.
Warships inbound. Full detachment, standard equipment. I want those amateurs out of my sight.

start_boss.text: Primary target. Unknown warship template. Engage. Locate structural weak points. Kill them.
Unique enemy craft. One-of-a-kind. It would be terrible if someone broke it.

retreat.text: Aborting. Better then fail the mission than fail the crew.
Get out of there, we can try again later.

engaged.text: Targets on the board. Good hunting.
A clumsy formation. Our opponents possess more enthusiasm than talent.
We have company. Enemy warship on scope.

need_help.text: Incoming fire, about to ring the doorbell.

pursuing.text: I am seeing a lot of hull shrapnel. Enemy morale destabilizing.
Enemy crew are panicking. Keep it up.
Maintain anti-warship cover. They are about to break.

running.text: Momentary withdrawal. We will be back soon.
Pulling back. Just for a moment.

hull_90.text: Armor rupture. Breach risk. Cover needed.

hull_50.text: We have a hull rupture. Full-on breach imminent. Repair.
Crew, fire on board. Attention needed.
We are burning. Deal with it.

hull_30.text: Priority repair order: Hull ruptures. Decompression risk.
Fix that breach or this vessel is a memory.
Not to nag, but in short order everything that inside this ship will be outside this ship.

overload.text: Electrical hazard. Flux components compromised. Repair.
Alert: System capacity: Low. Repair capacitor banks, immediately.

death.text: We have lost the day. Mission logged as failure.
You were unprepared. This is on me.

victory.text: Enemy in retreat. Sector secured. Drawing a line under this one.
The enemy is no longer a viable threat. Your tactics were sound.
Not a bad warmup. Objectives met. Moving on.
